metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13231 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Cacti before 1.2.11, auth_profile.php?action=edit allows CSRF for an admin email change.

notes.Note: ccdm94> the fix present in 107bfecebfd seems to be incomplete. The patch in 25abe644837, which also addresses CVE-2020-13230, includes fixes that also address this CVE.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
